detail_desc: Padded outdoor trousers in wind- and waterproof, breathable functional fabric with sealed seams and adjustable elastic braces with plastic fasteners. Zip fly and press-stud, reinforced at the hems and back, elasticated hems, a reinforced elastic strap under the feet and a reflective strip on one leg. Lined. The trousers have a water-repellent coating without fluorocarbons.

Padded jacket with a detachable, padded, faux fur-trimmed hood, stand-up collar and zip and wind flap with concealed press-studs down the front. Patch pockets with a flap and concealed press-stud, side pockets, elasticated cuffs and reflective details. Lined.
High-waisted 5-pocket jeans in washed, coated stretch denim with a zip fly and button, fake front pockets, real back pockets and skinny legs.
Printed swim shorts with an elasticated waist with ties. Mesh inner shorts.
Swim shorts with an elasticated, drawstring waist and fake fly. Soft mesh inner shorts.

Lace body with narrow adjustable shoulder straps, a lined gusset with press-studs and a half-string back.
Triangle bikini top with removable inserts and narrow shoulder straps that link together into a racer back and tie at the back.

Short shorts in printed sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist.
Long coat in soft satin with a shawl collar, front pockets, a tie belt at the waist and slits in the sides. Unlined.

Two-button jacket in stretch cotton seersucker with notch lapels, a welt chest pocket, patch pockets and two inner pockets. One button at the cuffs. Lined. Slim fit that tapers at the chest and waist, which combined with slightly narrower sleeves creates a fitted silhouette.

Two-button jacket in cotton-blend jersey with notch lapels, patch pockets and a straight-cut hem. Unlined. Slim fit that tapers at the chest and waist, which combined with slightly narrower sleeves creates a fitted silhouette.

Two-button jacket in sturdy stretch jersey with narrow notch lapels, a chest pocket, welt front pockets and an inner pocket.  Lined sleeves. Slim fit that tapers at the chest and waist, which combined with slightly narrower sleeves creates a fitted silhouette.

Two-button jacket in dogtooth-patterned fabric with peak lapels, a chest pocket, flap front pockets and three inner pockets, one with a button. Decorative buttons at the cuffs and a single back vent. Lined. Slim fit that tapers at the chest and waist, which combined with slightly narrower sleeves creates a fitted silhouette.

Tuxedo jacket in woven fabric with a satin shawl collar, chest pocket, jetted front pockets and two inner pockets. Fastening with one button at the front, a button at the cuffs and a single back vent. Lined. Slim Fit – a fit that tapers at the chest and waist, which combined with slightly narrower sleeves creates a fitted silhouette. The jacket is made partly from recycled polyester.

Three-button jacket in a wool blend with notch lapels with a decorative buttonhole, welt side pockets and an inner pocket. Unlined. Slim fit that tapers at the chest and waist, which combined with slightly narrower sleeves creates a fitted silhouette.
Puff shorts in a cotton weave with a front section and back pocket in broderie anglaise. Elasticated waist with a decorative bow and side pockets. Lined.
Leggings in soft, superstretch denim with an elasticated waist, fake front pockets and real back pockets.
Leggings in soft, superstretch denim with an elasticated waist, fake front pockets and real back pockets.
Sleeveless satin dress with a hook-and-eye fastener at the back of the neck, opening at the back and a seam at the hips with a gently flared skirt. Lined.

Non-wired lace triangle bra with mesh-lined cups that give the bust a natural shape and light support. Narrow adjustable shoulder straps that divide into two at the front. Narrow fastening at the back with two pairs of hooks and eyes and an elasticated hem.
Nylon jacket with a zip down the front, flap front pockets with a press-stud, a zipped sleeve pocket and one inner pocket. Ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Fine-knit lining.

Short, padded jacket in woven fabric with a lined hood with a collar and drawstring, and a zip at the front. Flap side pockets with a press-stud, one inner pocket with a hook and loop fastener and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Polyester filling. Lined.
